scripts.postinstall: node_modules/rollup/bin/rollup js-es6/main.js > dist/rollup.js && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js dist/rollup.js -o dist/app.js && rm -f dist/rollup.js
scripts.build: node_modules/rollup/bin/rollup js-es6/main.js > dist/rollup.js && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js dist/rollup.js -o dist/app.js && rm -f dist/rollup.js
